name: nodoku-mambaui
description: a collection of visual components, based Mamba UI components from mambaui.com, for Nodoku static site generator

scripts.dist: shx rm -rf dist && tsc && shx cp -r schemas ./dist && shx cp nodoku.manifest.json dist && shx cp package-dist.json ./dist/package.json && shx cp -r ./docs ./dist && shx cp ./README.md ./dist
